effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.black_2_white_2: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.black_white: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.black_white: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. It also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
